content.en: Enhanced X-ray Imaging: Scientists are using algorithms to improve various techniques in X-ray imaging. These algorithms enhance visibility, produce multiple images, enable real-time and quantitative imaging, and reconstruct complex wavefields and diffraction patterns. They are also used to bridge the gap between different imaging methods, overcome limitations in field of view, improve phase tomography, and achieve nanoscale resolved three-dimensional imaging. Additionally, algorithms are being developed to relax coherence requirements, enhance signal and phasing, and image deformed nanocrystals.
content.da: Forbedret røntgenbilleddannelse: Forskere anvender algoritmer til at forbedre forskellige teknikker inden for røntgenbilleddannelse. Disse algoritmer forbedrer synligheden, producerer flere billeder, muliggør realtids- og kvantitativ billeddannelse samt rekonstruerer komplekse bølgefelter og diffraktionsmønstre. De bruges også til at bygge bro mellem forskellige billeddannelsesmetoder, overvinde begrænsninger i synsfelt, forbedre fase-tomografi og opnå tredimensionel billeddannelse med nanoskalas opløsning. Derudover udvikles algoritmer til at slække kravene til koherens, forbedre signal og fasebestemmelse samt billeddannelse af deformerede nanokrystaller.
